ExternalData.Titlesect: International Agreement for the Establishment of the University for Peace

TreatyText.Label: Text
TreatyText.Text: United Nations, Treaty Series , vol. 1223, p. 87; and C.N.1127.2001.TREATIES-3 of 1 November 20011.

TreatyNote.Text: The Agreement was adopted by resolution 35/552 of the General Assembly of the United Nations dated 5 December 1980. It was open for definitive signature by all States at the United Nations Headquarters in New York from 5 December 1980 to 31 December 1981.
